text: I really don't have favorites I'm just a fan of movies, period.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

text: Hollywood is throwing action movies at me.
author: Liam Neeson

text: I had done some flimflam movies, but I didn't understand what being an actor meant anymore.
author: Liam Neeson

text: Before 'Schindler's List,' I wouldn't have believed movies had a lot of power for social change.
author: Liam Neeson

text: A lot of the struggle I had with movies is I really loved moments and tones and feelings in a scene, and I loved creating those, but I never really had great stories to string them together.
author: Louis C. K.
